sub_title: QA, RA, R&D Medical Devices and Artificial Intelligence Leader | Enterpreneur
summary: Dr. Alex Zaretskiy is the Regulatory Lead within AI Notified Body (part of BSI group) and member of standard making organizations CEN/CLC JTC 21 and ISO/IEC JTC 1/SC 42 in the field of Artificial Intelligence and Big Data. Alex holds a PhD and MSc in Medical Devices, specializing in integrated Artificial Intelligence (AI) with a focus on convolutional neural networks (CNN). Additionally, he has a BSc in Medical Devices and recently completed an EMBA from Quantic University (2023). With a rich background spanning over a decade, Alex has excelled in various domains such as Business Development, Start-up raising, R&D, Quality, and Regulatory aspects. Notably, he has successfully raised two pioneering start-ups in the Medical Devices and AI field, guiding them through the crucial B-phase before their acquisition by industry-leading branches. His expertise lies in Strategy, Strategic leadership, and Start-up entrepreneurship. By harmonizing the life cycles of Medical Devices and AI with business requirements, Alex leverages his technical and business acumen to create and implement lean and agile approaches.

profile_positions.title: Deputy Head Of Department; Lecturer

profile_positions.description: Co-founder and the CEO of the company designed Vital signs monitor (VSM) with an ML-based models for prediction of critical states of patients in OR and ICU regards to cardiac abnormalities (this included AF, VF, cardiac arrest).
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder, CEO
Deputy Head of Development Department

profile_positions.description:
Key role functions, description, and results:
- full P&L and fundraising project budget responsibility (investment rounds from $35K to $1.15M)
- R&D execution and control of bare metal stent with innovative wall-shape with completed design verification and validation
- R&D execution and control of math algorithms and SW-solution for decision making support for stents implantation with completed design verification and validation
- implementation and management of QMS in compliance with ISO 13485 and 21CFR requirements
- performance improvement of resource planning and recruiting activities (team size of 8 employees + external consultants)
- successful clinical validation of product on account of accomplished clinical trials (in accordance with ISO 14155) and increased clinic databases networks 
- successful exit and closing of the deal with acquisition partner (term sheet, acquisition steps, IP etc)
profile_positions.title: Founder, CEO and CTO

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities: 
- Successfully executed clinical support and facilitated the installation of new equipment in clinics, resulting in improved patient care and increased operational efficiency.
- Managed and provided oversight of comprehensive trainings on BW products, new technologies, wetlab techniques, and provided demo laptops to new staff and doctors, ensuring a smooth transition and enhanced knowledge transfer.
- Played a key role in driving the adoption and implementation of innovative technologies such as Smart Touch catheters, enabling advanced and precise medical procedures.
- Managed a customer ranking project and provided valuable business assistance based on clinical activity data, resulting in enhanced customer satisfaction and optimized business strategies.
- Managed review of technical information, meeting deadlines and maintaining high-quality standards, ensuring accuracy and reliability of critical documentation.
- Organized round-table discussions on cardiology preparation for RFA (Radiofrequency Ablation) procedures, fostering collaboration, knowledge sharing, and best practices among experts in the field.
